app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Brian Voice Translate
app_description: Brian Speak Translate is an essential voice and text translator that allows you to communicate effectively anywhere in the world. Have you ever traveled abroad and struggled with language barriers Worry no more! With Brian Speak Translate you ll be able to text and speak in over 100 languages even in remote areas without data or wifi with our offline mode! And if you re in a restaurant just use our Detector Mode to easily translate the whole menu with your phone s camera! It s that easy to act fluent in another language! FREE FEATURES: Text Translation: Want to know a word sentence or longer phrase in a different language Simply type in the text and get the instant translation more 100 languages! Notes: Create notes and save long time. Now also supports speech recognition Voice Translation: Translate any spoken word or phrase more 50 languages! male or female voice and its speed Language Detection: Don t know the language of the source text Let our app automatically detect and translate it for you! Detector Mode: Just snap a picture of any text or object you want translated! Offline Mode: Avoid expensive roaming costs and translate offline! Unlimited Translations: Get as many text and voice translations as you need! Supported languages dialects for translation: South Africa U.A.E Bahrain Algeria Egypt Iraq Jordan Kuwait Lebanon Libya Morocco Oman Qatar Saudi Arabia Syria Tunisia Yemen Azerbaijan Belarus Bulgaria Bosnia and Herzegovina Croatia Hungary English Armenia Czech Denmark Austria French Switzerland Germany Liechtenstein Luxembourg Maldives Greece Netherlands Australia Canada Ireland Jamaica New Zealand Philippines Trinidad and Tobago United States Zimbabwe Argentina Bolivia Chile Colombia Costa Rica Dominican Republic Ecuador Guatemala Honduras Mexico Nicaragua Panama Peru Puerto Rico Paraguay El Salvador Uruguay Venezuela Estonia Iran Finland Lao Myanmar Nepal Afghanistan Belgium Israel India Indonesia Iceland Georgia Kazakhstan Italia Japan Korea Kyrgyzstan Lithuania Latvia Mongolia Malaysia Poland Brazil Portugal Singapore Macau Romania Russia Slovakia Spanish Sweden Albania Thai Turkey Chinese Simplified Vietnamese
